headline.main: 100 VILLAGES FALL TO SOVIET AT OREL; Red Army Gains 5 to 7 Miles on Rim of Bastion in Face of Hard Counter-Blows

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Monday, Aug. 2 -- Russian troops advanced over muddy roads and rain-bogged fields Sunday to capture more than 100 towns and villages in a general advance of from five to seven and one-half miles around the entire rim of the Orel salient from northwest to southwest.
abstract: USSR forces take more than 100 villages, Orel advance; Ger attacks in Donets Basin and Belgorod area reptd repelled; map
